attributes.action: End all pay-offs for MPs beyond the minimum statutory amount that an ordinary member of the public is entitled to.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have been made redundant through no fault of my own and received the minimum statutory redundancy amount.

I believe that MPs who leave parliament before or because of the next general election should only be entitled to the same payment. Their departures will be at least as much due to their own failings as my recent redundancy!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
